description:
Hozuki uses the apathetic nature of the Zashiki Warashi twins to wrangle a newcomer to Hell. Later, Hozuki settles a disagreement between different departments.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les jumelles sans visage / Les Enfers et la grammaire
Poker nara Muteki / Ikisaki wa Jigoku no Hou de Yoroshikatta Deshouka
Unrivaled at Poker / Is Hell Your Intended Destination?
ポーカーなら無敵 / 逝き先は地獄の方で宜しかったでしょうか
